column2: "Na yinom ekyir no
column3: ɔbaa dɛ annkyɛr biara na okoduaduaa nkurow mu nye nkuraase kɛkaa Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no ho asɛmpa no kyerɛe; nna duebien no ka no ho
column5: "nye mbaa bi so a woetu hɔn esunsum bɔn na wɔasa hɔn ahoɔmberɛw yarba: Mary a wɔfrɛ no Magdalene a mbɔnsam esuon efi no mu no
column8: Herod no somfo panyin Kusa ne yer no
column10: nye dodowara so a wɔdze hɔn ahodze bi soom no no."

column2: "Na nyimpadodow pii boaa ano
column3: na hɔn a wofii nkurow nyina mu baa ne nkyɛn no
column6: "Ogufo no kɔree koguu n’aba: na ɔrotow petse no

column2: "Bi so koguu ɔbotan do
column3: na ofifirii no

column2: "Na bi so koguu nsoɛ finimfin
column3: na nsoɛ no nye no fifirii

column2: "Bi so koguu asaase pa do
column3: na ofifirii na ɔsoow aba mbɔho ɔha.  Na ɔkaa yinom no
column5: Nyia ɔwɔ aso a wɔdze tsie no

column2: "Na n’esuafo no bisaa no dɛ bɛ yi n’ase nye dɛn?"
"Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Hom dze
column4: wɔdze ama hom dɛ hom nhu Nyankopɔn ahenman no mu esumasɛm; na nkaa no dze

column2: "Na bɛ no n’asekyerɛ nye yi: aba no nye Nyankopɔn n’asɛm no."
"Hɔn a wɔwɔ kwan nkyɛn no nye hɔn a woetsie; na abɔnsam ba
column3: na obeyi asɛm no fi hɔn akoma mu
column4: ma wɔaanngye enndzi na wɔaanngye hɔn nkwa."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔwɔ ɔbotan do nye hɔn a wotsie a
column3: wɔdze dɛw gye asɛm no; na yinom wonnyi ndwow
column4: na wɔgye dzi ma ɔkyɛr kakra
column5: na nsɔhwɛber ba a nna wɔhwe ase."

column2: "Na dza okoguu nsoɛ mu no
column3: yinom nye hɔn a woetsie na wɔrokɔ no
column4: ɔbra yi mu akɔdadwen nye ahonya nye enyigyedze mia hɔn
column5: ma wɔnnsow aba ma ɔmmber yie."

column2: "Na dza ɔwɔ asaase pa mu no
column3: yinom nye hɔn a wɔdze akoma pa a oye etsie asɛm no
column5: na wɔnam abotar mu sow aba."

column2: "Obi nnsɔ kandzea na ɔmmfa kuruw mmbua do
column3: anaa ɔmmfa nnsi mpa ase; na ɔdze si kandzeadua do
column4: ma hɔn a wɔkɔ mu hɔ eehu ne kan."

column2: "Na biribi nnsuma a wonnkeyi no edzi
column3: na onnhunta a wonnkohu na ɔnnkɛda gua."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nhwɛ yie mbrɛ hom dua tsie; na obiara a ɔwɔ no
column3: wɔbɛma no
column5: dza osusu dɛ ɔwɔ mpo wɔbɛgye ne nsamu."

column2: "Na ne na nye no nuanom baa ne nkyɛn
column3: na woenntum ammbɛn no wɔ nyimpadodow no ntsi."

column2: "Na wɔbɛkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column3: Wo na nye wo nuanom gyina abow enyim rohwehwɛ ehu wo."

column2: "Na obuae see hɔn dɛ
column3: Me na nye mo nuanom nye woyi a wotsie Nyankopɔn asɛm na wɔyɛ."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ da bi ɔnye n’esuafo no kɔr hɛmba mu
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom mma yentwa nkɔ esuegya no ho

column2: "Na wɔrokɔ no ɔdae; na mframa kɛse bɔɔ huu baa esu no do
column3: na nkyɛ nsu rehyɛ hɔn hɛmba no ma

column2: "Na wɔdze nkekamu baa ne nkyɛn benyaan no see dɛ
column3: Owura
column6: ɔbraa mframa no nye nsu no ne begyabegya no

column2: "Na obisaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom gyedzi wɔ hen?  Na wosuroi
column6: Woana nye yi a ɔhyɛ mframa nye nsu mpo ma wotsie no yi?"

column2: "Na wodur Gerasafo asaase do a ɔwɔ Galilii tsentsendo."
"Na ofii hɛmba mu kɔr daadze no
column3: ɔbarimba bi a ɔwɔ sunsum fi puei fi kurow no mu behyiaa no: na mber pii nna ɔnnhyɛ atar
column5: na mbom abodan mu wɔ esiei na ɔtse."

column2: "Na ohun Jesus no
column3: ɔkaa mu
column5: na ɔdze ndze kɛse see dɛ
column8: Ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn Ba? Meserɛ wo dɛ mma nnhaw me."

column2: "Osiandɛ nna Jesus aka akyerɛ sunsum fi no dɛ omfi nyimpa no mu. (Osiandɛ mber pii ɔkyer no
column3: na wɔdze nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn nye mpokyerɛ to no weɔn no; naaso obubu dza wɔdze kyekyer no no mu
column4: na sunsum no pam no kɔ sar do.)"

column2: "Na Jesus bisaa no dɛ
column3: Wo dzin dze dɛn?  Na ɔsee dɛ
column5: osiandɛ mbɔnsam pii ahɛn no mu."

column2: "Na esunsum bɔn no serɛɛ no dɛ mma ɔnnhyɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔ bun no mu."
"Na mprekokuw kɛse bi wɔ hɔ a woridzidzi wɔ kokwaa no do; na esunsum no serɛɛ no dɛ ɔmma hɔn kwan ma wɔnkɔ hɔn mu. Na ɔmaa hɔn ho kwan."
"Na esunsum bɔn no fii nyimpa no mu kɔr mpreko no mu
column3: na okuw no faa twitwi kesiaan ɔbo kronn koguguu nsu no mu

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔrenyɛn hɔn no hun dza aba no
column3: woguanee na wɔkɛkae wɔ kurow no mu na no nkwaado."

column2: "Nna wopuei bɔhwɛɛ dza aba no
column3: na wɔbaa Jesus nkyɛn bohun nyimpa a sunsum bɔn fii no mu kɔree no dɛ ɔtsena Jesus n’anan ho

column2: "Na hɔn a wohunii no kaa mbrɛ ɔyɛe ma nyia nkyɛ sunsum bɔn wɔ no mu no no ho sanee no kyerɛɛ hɔn."
"Na Gerasafo nkurow a etwa ehyia nyina mu nkorɔfo bɛserɛɛ Jesus dɛ omfi hɔn nkyɛn nkɔ
column3: osiandɛ hu kɛse kaa hɔn. Na ɔkɔfoow hɛmba sanee kɔree."

column2: "Na nyimpa a sunsum bɔn fii no mu kɔree no serɛɛ no dɛ ɔnye no bɛtsena; naaso Jesus gyaa no kwan dɛ
column5: na kɛka ndzɛmba akɛse a Nyankopɔn ayɛ ama wo kyerɛ.  Na osii mu kɔree kɛkaa ndzɛmba a Jesus ayɛ ama no wɔ kurow no nyina mu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ Jesus sanee kɔree no
column3: nyimpadodow no gyee no
column4: osiandɛ nna hɔn nyina rotweɔn no."

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: ɔbarimba bi a ne dzin dze Jairus a ɔyɛ nhyiamudan mu panyin no bae; na ɔbɔhwee Jesus n’ananadze
column4: na ɔserɛɛ no dɛ ɔmbra ne fie;"

column2: "na ɔwɔ babaa kor a oedzi bɛyɛ mfe duebien na ɔda hɔ ruwu. Na ɔrokɔ no nyimpadodow no kyeer no do."
"Na ɔbaa bi a oenya bɔgyaagu mfe duebien
column3: na ɔahwer n’adze nyina ama eduyɛfo
column4: na eso obiara enntum annsa no yarba
column6: "bae bedzii n’ekyir kaa n’atar ano ndwow; na amonmu hɔ ara na no bɔgyaagu twae."

column2: "Na Jesus see dɛ
column3: Woana na ɔkaa me no?  Na hɔn nyina resan no
column4: Peter nye hɔn a wɔka no ho no kaa dɛ
column6: nyimpadodow akyer wo do na worimia wo."

column2: "Na Jesus see dɛ
column3: Obi aka me
column4: na mehu dɛ ahoɔdzen bi efi mo mu kɔ."

column2: "Na ɔbaa no hun dɛ oennsuma no
column3: ɔdze ahopopo bae
column5: na ɔkaa adze kor a osian ntsi ma ɔkaa no
column6: na mbrɛ no ho yɛɛ no dzen amonmu hɔ ara kyerɛɛ no wɔ nkorɔfo no nyina enyim."

column2: "Na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Babaa
column4: wo gyedzi agye wo: kɔ asomdwee mu."

column2: "Na ɔrekasa no
column3: obi fi nhyiamudan mu panyin no ne fie bae bɛsee dɛ
column4: Wo babaa no ewu: mma nnhaw Kyerɛkyerɛfo no."

column2: "Na Jesus tsee no
column3: obuaa no dɛ

column2: "Na ɔbaa fie no mu no
column3: ɔamma kwan mma obiara annkɔ mu
column7: nye abofra no n’egya nye ne na."

column2: "Nna hɔn nyina rusu na woridzi awerɛhow. Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Mma hom nnsu: onnwui

column2: "Na wɔsereew no twee
column3: osiandɛ wonyim dɛ oewu."

column2: "Na ɔnodze osuoo ne nsamu
column3: na ɔfrɛɛ no dɛ

column2: "Na no sunsum sanee baa bio
column3: na ɔsoɛɛr ntsɛmara. Na Jesus hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmma no biribi ma ondzi."

column2: "Na n’awofo no ho boow hɔn; naaso ɔbraa hɔn dɛ mma wɔnnka dza wɔayɛ no nnkyerɛ obiara."
